page.title: 16Palm Cottage, Well St. Loose
page.content: Palm Cottage is thought to have been built in 1381. The owner now is Mrs.Clarke. In an interview that she gave with Catherine Blackman of Loose Junior School she said: "25 years ago hardly anyone had cars. Now nearly everyone has two cars. It will mean difficulty with parking and people pass through, rather than walk through the village." Mrs.Clarke would walk through the village with her baby 25 years ago and there would be several older people hanging over their gates and wanting to talk so that it would take all afternoon to walk round the village. "Now there are more young people and fewer older people. One reason is, as rented houses have become empty, the owners have sold them." Mrs.Clarke called the village a dormitory area.
